recipe.ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 2 cups water, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 1 cucumber, diced, 1/2 cup kalamata olives, pitted and halved, 1/2 red onion, finely chopped, 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled, 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped, 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar, 1 lemon, juiced, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe.directions: In a medium saucepan, combine quinoa and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes or until quinoa is cooked through. Fluff with a fork and allow to cool, In a large bowl, combine cooled quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, kalamata olives, red onion, feta cheese, and parsley, In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, and pepper. Pour over the quinoa mixture and toss to coat evenly, Chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
recipe.nutrition: Calories 210, Total fat 10g, Protein 6g, Cholesterol 8mg, Total carbohydrate 24g, Dietary fiber 3g, Monounsaturated fat 5g, Saturated fat 2g, Added sugars 0g, Sodium 312mg, Trans fat 0g, Potassium 270mg, Total sugars 3g
